# UCMJ Law
UCMJ and SOP applies to all GOVFOR personnel as well as those aboard a GOVFOR vessel or base.
## Basics
- Command and [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color] are required to both enforce the law and abide by it, where allowed by their position on the ship. - [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color] may, at their discretion, ignore Minor Crimes unless they are ordered to enforce one. - [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color] cannot be ordered to ignore Minor Crimes. - [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color] breaking the law in any capacity cannot be ignored.
Should [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color]s disagree on cases, GOVFOR Law rank structure must be followed.
- [color=#ffa500][bold]Provost Marshal Office[/bold][/color] > [color=#00CBFE][bold]Company Command[/bold][/color] > [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color] > Deputized [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color] > [color=#8B0000][bold]Platoon Commander[/bold][/color] > [bold]Operations Officer[/bold]
